医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
Gyros Protein Technologies 和 Biotage 合作，通过新的自动化解决方案提高肽纯化效率Gyros Protein Technologies AB 今天宣布与 Offer Biotage® 建立合作伙伴关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231208/Gyros-Protein-Technologies-and-Biotage-partner-to-advance-peptide-purification-efficiency-with-new-automated-solution.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231208/Gyros-Protein-Technologies-and-Biotage-partner-to-advance-peptide-purification-efficiency-with-new-automated-solution.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f5e2c121-cd0f-4d94-b2d0-62d60d68c5d7 Fri, 08 Dec 2023 03:19:00 -0500 Gyros Protein Technologies and Biotage partner to advance peptide purification efficiency with new automated solution
新的最先进的基因组服务设施在英国开业Azenta Life Sciences 选择欧洲重要的生命科学中心——英国牛津作为其下一个 GENEWIZ 多组学和合成解决方案站点的所在地。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231208/New-state-of-the-art-genomic-services-facility-opening-in-the-UK.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231208/New-state-of-the-art-genomic-services-facility-opening-in-the-UK.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eb0a69f7-c648-486d-a159-541b2178f46e Fri, 08 Dec 2023 02:29:00 -0500 New state-of-the-art genomic services facility opening in the UK
冷冻电镜显示 TAF15 是额颞叶痴呆的潜在治疗靶点包括印第安纳大学医学院专家在内的一个国际研究小组在额颞叶痴呆 (FTD) 患者大脑中发现了一种蛋白质，为该疾病的潜在治疗方法找到了新靶点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231207/Cryo-EM-reveals-TAF15-as-potential-treatment-target-for-frontotemporal-dementia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231207/Cryo-EM-reveals-TAF15-as-pottial-treatment-target-for-frontotemporal-dementia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=78ba5945-4093-4ff4-9f81-e4257efd74f5 Thu, 07 Dec 2023 23:54:00 -0500 Cryo-EM reveals TAF15 as potential treatment target for frontotemporal dementia
融合胰腺癌类器官系统捕获肿瘤异质性和耐药性胰腺导管腺癌（PDAC）由胰腺上皮细胞产生，是最常见的胰腺癌形式，死亡率非常高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231207/Fused-pancreatic-cancer-organoid-system-captures-tumor-heterogeneity-and-drug-resistance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231207/Fused-pancreatic-cancer-organoid-system-captures-tumor-heterogeneity-and-drug-resistance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=13c8fdef-2335-4fad-a94a-6867a4f1fee8 Thu, 07 Dec 2023 23:51:18 -0500 Fused pancreatic cancer organoid system captures tumor heterogeneity and drug resistance
研究确定了脂肪肝治疗的新目标全球肥胖和糖尿病的增加正在导致脂肪肝疾病的流行，影响到世界20-30%的人口。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231207/Study-identizes-new-target-for-fatty-liver-disease-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231207/Study-identizes-new-target-for-fatty-liver-disease-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=149252e5-6d35-405d-9a30-851b68d1c710 Thu, 07 Dec 2023 23:34:26 -0500 Study identifies new target for fatty liver disease treatment
研究发现，重复使用 mRNA 疫苗可增强针对 COVID-19 的免疫反应发表在《自然免疫学》上的研究表明，重复接种 mRNA COVID-19 疫苗可以增强免疫反应，特别是在以前感染过的个体中，从而导致免疫细胞克隆的多样化和数量增加，以及对抗各种病毒株的能力更强。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231207/Repeated-mRNA-vaccines-supercharge-immune-response-against-COVID-19-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231207/Repeated-mRNA-vaccines-supercharge-immune-response-against-COVID-19-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=96932edf-e11f-461e-b47e-758114f6d282 Thu, 07 Dec 2023 23:06:00 -0500 Repeated mRNA vaccines supercharge immune response against COVID-19, study finds
一类糖尿病药物可以降低结直肠癌的风险凯斯西储大学研究人员进行的一项开创性研究表明，用于治疗 2 型糖尿病的一类药物也可能降低结直肠癌 (CRC) 的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231207/A-class-of-diabetes-medications-may-reduce-the-risk-of-colorectal-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231207/A-class-of-diabetes-medications-may-reduce-the-risk-of-colorectal-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a01c7068-e9de-4f31-8115-101ea1416f5b Thu, 07 Dec 2023 23:02:27 -0500 A class of diabetes medications may reduce the risk of colorectal cancer
研究显示术后阿片类药物处方减少，但敦促继续努力一项新的研究显示，在过去七年中，术后疼痛缓解已经不再使用含有阿片类药物的药物，但自 2020 年以来下降趋势已放缓。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231207/Study-shows-decline-in-post-surgery-opioid-prescriptions-but-urges-continued-efforts.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231207/Study-shows-decline-in-post-surgery-opioid-prescriptions-but-urges-continued-efforts.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=be2303a4-6b91-42d2-9044-536381d4a764 Thu, 07 Dec 2023 22:46:50 -0500 Study shows decline in post-surgery opioid prescriptions, but urges continued efforts
突破性的“面疙瘩”地图揭示了人类基因组隐藏的秘密研究提出了一个由 76,156 个人类基因组构建的全基因组图谱“Gnocchi”，揭示了富含调控元件的非编码区域对于理解人类特征和疾病至关重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231207/Groundwriting-Gnocchi-map-reveals-hidden-secrets-of-the- human-genome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231207/Groundwriting-Gnocchi-map-reveals-hidden-secrets-of-the- human-genome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=784fbf95-a426-45e6-add6-17b0f3ff2a3e Thu, 07 Dec 2023 22:32:00 -0500 Groundbreaking 'Gnocchi' map reveals hidden secrets of the human genome
你的身体不协调吗？研究发现器官老化速度不同研究发现，人体器官的衰老速度各不相同，有些器官的衰老速度比实际年龄更快，这对整体健康和疾病风险产生了显着影响。该研究利用先进的血浆蛋白质组学分析了近 5,700 名成年人的器官特异性衰老，将其与心力衰竭和阿尔茨海默氏病的风险增加联系起来。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231207/Is-your-body-out-of-sync-Study-finds-organs-age-at-variing-rates.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231207/Is-your-body-out-of-sync-Study-finds-organs-age-at-variing-rates.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2924563a-c5d7-4e46-835f-3bfa3da3c666 Thu, 07 Dec 2023 22:07:00 -0500 Is your body out of sync? Study finds organs age at varying rates
